required.name: Afghanistan
required.note:
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who were born in Afghanistan
Visa not required for children born to citizens of Afghanistan
Visitors arriving via military air need to legalize their stay if they wish to leave via commercial airline.
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

required.name: Albania
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States

required.name: Angola
required.note:
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who are personnel of oil companies established in Angola, provided holding a photocopy of their passport, 4 photos, and a copy of a visa application which should be submitted by the oil company at least 2 weeks prior to arrival
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Argentina
required.note:
Visas are issued free of charge
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
All visitors are fingerprinted and photographed upon entry

required.name: Azerbaijan
required.note:
Visa on arrival for holders of an official invitation letter issued by the State Migration Service of Azerbaijan or other Azerbaijan government authority
Visa on arrival for staff of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and their dependents, provided holding an official invitation letter issued by the Asian Development Bank (ADB)
Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days for holders of an official invitation letter issued by the Operating Committee of Baku Chess Olympiad or an accreditation card issued by the International Chess Federation (FIDE)
The visa application form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission
Obtaiable online through approved travel agencies. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Applicants of Armenian ancestry or with Armenian visas in their passport may not obtain a visa
Registration with the local police upon arrival is mandatory

required.name: The Bahamas
required.note: Negotiations to abolish visa requirements are currently in progress

required.name: Bahrain
required.note:
Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Multiple-entry Visa is granted on arrival for residents of GCC member states valid for 3 months within 6 months for a maximum stay of 2 weeks per visit

required.name: Belarus
required.note:
Visa not required for visitors to Belovezhskaya Pushcha National Park for up to 3 days
Visa on arrival at the Minsk International Airport if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 working days before expected date of arrival
Transiting without a visa is not allowed under any circumstance
Registration with the local police within 7 days of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Belize
required.note:
Visa not required for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states or the United States
Departure tax applies

required.name: Benin
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of an Authorisation Speciale d'Entree au Benin traveling to join mercy ships
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Bhutan
required.note: Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 15 days for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who sent their application by a tour operator to the department of tourism at least two and a half months in advance, provided holding 2 passport photos

required.name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 7 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states
Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Brazil
required.note:
Eligible to apply for three-year visas valid for tourism and business trips and may use them whenever they visit Brazil within that period
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Visa is not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of a VIPER visa issued by Brazil

required.name: Brunei
required.note: Immigration offenses, such as visa overstaying, are punishable by jail, fines, and caning

required.name: Bulgaria
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states

required.name: Burkina Faso
required.note:
Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Cameroon
required.note:
Visa on arrival to holders of a pre-arranged approval issued by "Le Delegue General de la Surete"
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Canada
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of a Green Card issued by the United States unless deemed inadmissible. In addition and as of September 30, 2016, an eTA is required for holders of a Green Card issued by the United States
Transit visa not required for holders of a B or C visa issued by Switzerland when traveling to the United States flying with Air Canada
Visa not required for holders of a valid student or employment authorization and/or holders of a Parapan Identity and Accreditation Card (PIAC)
Obtainable online for visitor, study, work, medical, and permanent residence visas. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel

required.name: Central African Republic
required.note: International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Chad
required.note:
Visa on arrival for holders of an Entry Authorization Letter issued by Chad
International Certificate of Vaccination is required
Registration with the local police within 72 hours of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Chile
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: China
required.note: Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Republic of the Congo
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of a V.I.P invitation letter
A letter of invitation or written proof of a hotel reservation is required
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
required.note:
Registration with the local police upon arrival is mandatory
Departure tax applies
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Costa Rica
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of Canada or the European Union member states
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid multiple-entry visa holders or residents of Japan or the United States used at least once and valid for at least 6 months beyond the period of intended stay
Departure tax applies

required.name: Croatia
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states
Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Cuba
required.note:
Tourist Cards (Tarjeta del Turista) must be obtained prior to arrival from diplomatic missions of Cuba, authorized Airlines, or travel agencies
Valid for a maximum stay of 30 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 60 days for a fee

required.name: Cyprus
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: Dominican Republic
required.note:
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who are born in Dominican Republic
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, or the United States

required.name: Egypt
required.note:
Visa not required for spouses and children of male citizens of Egypt
Visa not required for children of female citizens of Egypt provided they are born after 25 July 2004
Visa not required if travelling as a part of a tourist group that consists of at least 10 persons, provided holding a return or circle trip ticket, a hotel reservation, and a signed guarantee letter from a travel agency
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months if aged 50 years and above or 16 years and below

required.name: El Salvador
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states

required.name: Equatorial Guinea
required.note: International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Eritrea
required.note:
Visa required for minors under 18 years of age accompanied by parents, provided holding an Eritrean National ID Card
Visa on arrival if a request is submitted to the Eritrean Immigration Authority 48 hours prior to arrival, provided holding one passport photo
Departure tax applies

required.name: Ethiopia
required.note:
Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Visa on arrival at Addis Ababa Bole International Airport if attending meetings, seminars, or workshops organized by the African Union, provided holding an invitation letter stating the purpose of travel
Visa on arrival at Addis Ababa Bole International Airport, provided holding an invitation letter issued to participants of the UNECA (United Nations Economic Commission for Africa) conferences and meetings held at the U.N conference Center in Addis Ababa
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

required.name: The Gambia
required.note:
Visa not required for if travelling for tourism purposes on a charter flight
International Certificate of Vaccination is required
Negotiations to abolish visa requirements are currently in progress

required.name: Ghana
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of a Dual Nationality Card issued by Ghana
Visa not required for holders of a pre-arranged visa
Visa on arrival for holders of a copy of a pre-arranged approval from immigration
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Grenada
required.note: Visa on arrival for holders of an Acceptance Letter or a Letter of Good Standing issued to new or returning students of St George's University

required.name: Guatemala
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, or the United States
Departure tax applies

required.name: Guinea
required.note:
Visa on arrival for holders of an approval letter issued by the Directeur Central de la Police de l'Air et des Frontieres
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Guyana
required.note:
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who are under 17 years of age and were born in Guyana
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days for holders of a letter of invitation from a sponsor or host, contact details of sponor/host/hotel, and 2 passport photos
Visa on arrival for holders of a confirmation, issued by the Ministry of Home Affairs, or a pre-arranged business, employment, or student visa

required.name: Honduras
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states
Departure tax applies

required.name: Hungary
required.note: Visa not required for 90 days within 180 days inside Schengen Area for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: India
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of a Person of Indian Origin (PIO) Card
Visa not required for holders of an Overseas Citizen of India" card or booklet

required.name: Iraq
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of a signed and stamped letter issued by the Ministry of Interior of Iraq if arriving at Baghdad (BGW), Basra (BSR), or Najaf (NJF) airports
Visa not required for holders of a signed and stamped letter issued by the Ministry of Interior of the Kurdistan Regional Government if arriving at Erbil (EBL) or Sulaymaniyah (ISU) airports
Visa on arrival for Business managers, investors, international experts, oil company managers or representatives traveling on business if arriving at Basra (BSR), provided holding return/onward tickets and passports valid at least 6 months

required.name: Republic of Ireland
required.note: Strict application of immigration rules apply regarding providing proof of the trip purpose, sufficient funds, return ticket and accommodation even, provided holding a valid visa

required.name: Israel
required.note: A confirmation from Jerusalem is required before a visa is issued

required.name: Jamaica
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states
Visa not requuired for holders of passports or other travel documents endorsed with an "Unconditional Landing" stamp
Departure tax applies

required.name: Japan
required.note: All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

required.name: Kazakhstan
required.note:
Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 1 month for holders of a pre-arranged visa by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
Visa on arrival if arriving from a country without Kazakh diplomatic mission, provided holding an invitation letter

required.name: Kenya
required.note:
International Certificate of Vaccination is required
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

required.name: Kiribati
required.note: Departure tax applies

required.name: Kuwait
required.note:
Visa on arrival for residents of GCC member states for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months
Visa on arrival for holders of confirmation from the transporting carrier and are traveling for tourism purposes for a maximum stay of 1 month

required.name: Liberia
required.note:
Visa on arrival if arriving from a country without a diplomatic mission of Liberia and a visa is pre-arranged and paid for by a local sponsor in Liberia
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Libya
required.note: Visa not required for holders of a copy of a letter issued by the Libyan immigration authorities confirming that a visa will be granted on arrival at the airport

required.name: Lithuania
required.note:
The form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission
Medical insurance of a minimum coverage of 30,000 Euros which covers the entire Schengen region for the full duration of the intended stay is mandatory

required.name: Republic of Macedonia
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 15 days for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, the United Kingdom, or the United States
Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Mali
required.note:
Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Malta
required.note: Visa not required except for 90 days within 180 days inside Schengen Area for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: Marshall Islands
required.note: Departure tax applies

required.name: Mexico
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 180 days within 1 year for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, Japan, or the United States

required.name: Mongolia
required.note:
Visa on arrival at Ulaanbaatar (ULN) Airport for holders of a confirmation of a pre-arranged visa if their passport is valid for at least one year, holing 2 passport photos, and are arriving from a country with no Mongolian Immigration Authority
Registration with the local police within 30 days of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Montenegro
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states or the United States
Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Morocco
required.note: Visa not required for children under 17 years of age having a Moroccan parent(s) and being registered in the parent's passport

required.name: Nauru
required.note: Visa not required for holders of an entry permit letter issued by Nauru

required.name: New Zealand
required.note: Obtainable online for Student, Work, or Visitor visas. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel

required.name: Nicaragua
required.note: Visa on arrival for a maximum smetay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, or the United States

required.name: Niger
required.note: International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Norway
required.note: The form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission

required.name: Pakistan
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of a Pakistan Origin Card (POC)
Visa not required for holders of a National Identity Card for Overseas Pakistani (NICOP)
Visa not required for holders of passports issued by the Republic of Lebanon containing a "Visa exempt" stamp issued by Pakistan

required.name: Panama
required.note:
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who were born in Panama
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, or the United States

required.name: Paraguay
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: Peru
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: Philippines
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of one year for former citizens of the Philippines (Balikbayans)
Departure tax applies
Negotiations to abolish visa requirements are currently in progress

required.name: Poland
required.note: Dual citizens of Poland and Republic of Lebanon must use their Polish passport for admission

required.name: Qatar
required.note:
Visa on arrival for residents of GCC member states for a maximum stay of 1 month
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 4 months for a fee
Obtainable online though Qatar Airways. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Visa on arrival for infants under 2 years of age, born to alien residents of Qatar. The infant must travel with their own Lebanese passport. The parents must travel with their residence permit and one parent must be the sponsor of the other parent. A certified birth certificate of the infant is required

required.name: Russia
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 72 hours when entering Russia through the ports of Anadyr, Kaliningrad, Korsakov, Novorossiysk, Sevastopol, Sochi, St.Petersburg, Vladivostok, and Vyborg by ferry
Registration with the local police within 7 working days of arrival is mandatory
The visa application form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission

required.name: Saint Lucia
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 1 day for cruise ship passengers

required.name: San Marino
required.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states

required.name: Saudi Arabia
required.note:
No tourist visas available
Muslim female passengers arriving to perform Umrah or Hajj must be accompanied by one of her immediate family members such as father, brother, husband or son, who must be aged 18 years or older; or over 45 years of age and travelling within a group of female passengers of the same age, who are accompanied by a group leader until their departure
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

required.name: Senegal
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of an official invitation letter
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Serbia
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States
Visa not required for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: Sierra Leone
required.note:
Visa on arrival for holders of a copy of a pre-arranged visa
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

required.name: Singapore
required.note: Negotiations to abolish visa requirements are currently in progress

required.name: Slovakia
required.note: Registration with the local police within 3 working days of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Slovenia
required.note: Registration with the local police within 72 hours of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Solomon Islands
required.note: Visa on arrival for holders of a copy of a pre-arranged visa

required.name: South Africa
required.note: Holders of passports without 2 blank pages may be refused entry

required.name: South Sudan
required.note:
Visa on arrival for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon, being of Sudanese origin
Visa on arrival for holders of an identity card copy issued by the United Nations with a clearance from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in South Sudan
Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: Sudan
required.note:
Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 60 days for holders of an "Entry Permit" issued by the Sudanese Ministry of interior
Visa on arrival for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon, being of Sudanese origin
Registration with the local police within 3 days of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Suriname
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of a Persons of Surinamese Origin (PSA) document or a proof of being of Surinamese origin
Visa not required for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Visaon arrival for spouses and children of Persons of Surinamese Origin or citizens of the Republic of Lebanon, being of Surinamese origin, at Paramaribo International Airport (PBM) for a maximum stay of 90 days
Visaon arrival if arriving from a country without a Surinamese diplomatic mission for a maximum stay of 2 months

required.name: Switzerland
required.note: The form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission

required.name: Trinidad and Tobago
required.note: Visa on arrival for holders of a copy of a pre-arranged approval from immigration

required.name: Turkmenistan
required.note:
Visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 10 days for holders of a letter of invitation issued by a company registered in Turkmenistan after obtaining an approval from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
Departure tax applies

required.name: Ukraine
required.note: Visa not required for passengers under 18 year of age provided their name is mentioned in parent/guardian's visa

required.name: United Arab Emirates
required.note:
Visa on arrival for residents of GCC member states for a maximum stay of 1 month
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 3 months within 6 months for a fee
96-hour transit visa is granted on arrival at Dubai International Airport (DXB) provided the transit time is at least 8 hours, provided holding onward tickets to a third country, and holding a passport valid for at least 6 months
Obtainable online if arriving on Air Arabia, Emirates, Etihad, Air Baltic, Air Berlin, Air Serbia, and flydubai. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Electronic Visas online via www.ednrd.ae if residing in one of the 5 other GCC countries. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel



Iris scan taken upon entry

required.name: United States
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of a Form I-512 (Authorization for Parole of an Alien into the United States")
Obtainable online for non-immigrant visas (DS-160). However, the applicant must attend a scheduled interview at the nearest United States diplomatic mission
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

required.name: Uruguay
required.note:
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who were born in Uruguay
Visa not required for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

required.name: Uzbekistan
required.note:
The visa application form may be filled online and submitted to the diplomatic mission
Visa on arrival at Tashkent (TAS) Airport for holders of a Visa Confirmation stamp and 2 passport photos
Registration with the local police within 3 days of arrival is mandatory

required.name: Venezuela
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
All visa applications must be submitted in person, and all applicants will be interviewed at the diplomatic mission

required.name: Vietnam
required.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days at Phu Quoc (PQC) Airport
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for holders a Certificate of Visa Exemption issued to former citizens of Vietnam residing abroad
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for citizens of Vietnam, provided not holding a Vietnamese passport but only holding a foreign permanent residence permit
Visa on arrival at Hanoi (HAN) Airport for holders of a pre-approval letter issued by the Vietnamese Immigration (Ministry of Public Security)
Visa on arrival at Hanoi (HAN), Ho Chi Minh City (SGN), or Da Nang (DAD) airports for holders of a pre-approval letter issued by the Consular Department (Ministry of Foreign Affairs) for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months
Obtainable online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phu Quoc or Da Nang airports. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel

required.name: Yemen
required.note:
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon, being of Yemeni origin
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Registration with the local police is mandatory

not-required.name: Andorra
not-required.note: The Andorran government imposes no visa requirements on its visitors and only requires a passport or European Union national identity card for entrance. However, since the country is only accessible via the Schengen countries Spain or France, entrance is not possible without entering the Schengen area first and the Schengen visa rules can therefore be regarded to apply de facto. Because Andorra is not part of the Schengen area, a multiple-entry visa is required to reenter the Schengen area when leaving Andorra

not-required.name: Dominica
not-required.note:
Valid for 21 days
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 6 months for valid visa holders or residents of Canada, the European Union member states, the United Kingdom, or the United States
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 3 months within 6 months for a fee
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry
Departure tax applies

not-required.name: Ecuador
not-required.note:
Valid for 90 days within 180 days
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee

not-required.name: Haiti
not-required.note:
Valid for 3 months within 6 months within 6 months
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee

not-required.name: Indonesia
not-required.note:
Valid for 30 days
Extensions of stay is not possible

not-required.name: Iran
not-required.note:
Valid for 90 days
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee

not-required.name: Jordan
not-required.note:
Valid for 3 months within 6 months
May use their ID cards
Iris scan taken upon entry and departure

not-required.name: Malaysia
not-required.note:
Valid for 90 days within 180 days
Extensions of stay is possible twice, 30 days each, for a fee
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry and departure

not-required.name: Federated States of Micronesia
not-required.note:
Valid for 30 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 60 days for a fee
Departure tax applies

not-required.name: Niue
not-required.note:
Valid for 30 days
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee

not-required.name: Syria
not-required.note:
Valid for 6 months
May use their ID cards
Departure tax applies

not-required.name: Turkey
not-required.note:
Valid for 90 days within 180 days
Extensions of stay is not possible, but citizens of the Republic of Lebanon exceeding the period of 90 days within 180 days should obtain a residence permit ("Ikamet Vesikasi") from the immigration police and must be presented to airport officials upon departure

evisa.name: Antigua and Barbuda
evisa.note:
Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States
Visa waiver fee applies for valid visa holders or residents of the United States
Departure tax applies

evisa.name: Australia
evisa.note: Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel

evisa.name: Colombia
evisa.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 3 months within 6 months for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Departure tax applies

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note:
Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Electronic Visa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note:
Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Electronic Visa holders must arrive at Leon Mba International Airport in Libreville
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

evisa.name: South Korea
evisa.note:
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 30 days for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
Visa not required if arriving at and departing from Jeju (CJU) Airport
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who have previously entered Korea (Rep.) at least 4 times within the last 2 years or at least 10 visits in total
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

evisa.name: Moldova
evisa.note: Registration with the local police upon is mandatory

evisa.name: Nigeria
evisa.note: Visa not required for former citizens of Nigeria, provided holding a valid passport issued by the Republic of Lebanon together with an expired Nigerian passport

evisa.name: Romania
evisa.note: Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states

evisa.name: Rwanda
evisa.note:
Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
International Certificate of Vaccination is required
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

evisa.name: Saint Kitts and Nevis
evisa.note: Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel

evisa.name: São Tomé and Príncipe
evisa.note:
Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 15 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states and the United States
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

evisa.name: Zambia
evisa.note:
Visa not required for minors if they are mentioned in the passport of one of their parents
Holders of passports without 2 blank pages may be refused entry
Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

evisa.name: Zimbabwe
evisa.note:
Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
For tourism purposes only, visitors holding a valid Visa or eVisa are strictly prohibited from engaging in business activities and should obtain a business visa should they intend to do so
Visa on arrival for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

on-arrival.name: Armenia
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 120 days
Obtainable at Zvartnots International Airport in Yerevan, Gyumri Airport, Ayrum railway station, Bagratashen, Bavra, Gogavan and Megri land borders. (Extensions of stay is possible for additional 60 days for a fee)
Obtainable online. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 180 days for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports

on-arrival.name: Bangladesh
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 30 days
Obtainable at Shahjalal International Airport, Shah Amanat International Airport and Osmani International Airport
Visa not requuired for holders of passports or other travel documents endorsed with a "No Visa Required" stamp
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee
Departure tax applies

on-arrival.name: Bolivia
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 90 days within 180 days
Extensions of stay is possible for a maximum stay of 5 months for a fee
Departure tax applies

on-arrival.name: Burundi
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 3 months within 6 months
Obtainable at Bujumbura International Airport
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note:
Visa not required for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon who are born in Cambodia
Valid for 30 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 12 months for a fee
All visitors are fingerprinted upon entry

on-arrival.name: Cape Verde
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 90 days within 180 days
Obtainable at Nelson Mandela International Airport, Cesária Évora Airport, Amílcar Cabral International Airport and Aristides Pereira International Airport
Visa not required for former citizens of Cape Verde, alongside their spouse and children
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 for holders of Diplomatic, Service, and Official passports
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

on-arrival.name: Comoros
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 2 weeks
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee

on-arrival.name: Djibouti
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 1 month
Obtainable at Djibouti–Ambouli International Airport
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee

on-arrival.name: Guinea-Bissau
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 90 days within 180 days
Obtainable online. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel

on-arrival.name: Laos
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 30 days
Obtainable at international airports Wattay Vientiane, Pakse Savannakhet and Luang Prabang, and at land borders Friendship Bridge, Vientiane and Savannakhet; Nam Heuang Friendship Bridge, Sayabouly Province; and border crossings at Boten-Mohan, Dansavan-Lao Bao, Houaysay-Chiang Khong, Thakhek-Nakhon Phanom, Nong Haet-Nam Kan, Nam Phao-Kao Cheo, Veun Kham-Dong Calor, and Vangtao-Chong Mek as well as Tha Naleng train station in Vientiane, which connects to the train station in Nongkhai, Thailand. Entry points Napao-Chalo, Taichang-Sophoun, Pakxan-Bungkan, and Xiengkok are open only to visa holders
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 90 days for a fee

on-arrival.name: Madagascar
on-arrival.note:
90 days within 180 days
Extensions of stay for a maximum stay of 4 months is possible for a fee

on-arrival.name: Maldives
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 30 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 90 days for a fee

on-arrival.name: Mauritania
on-arrival.note:
Obtainable at Nouakchott–Oumtounsy International Airport valid for 3 days,15 days, 30 days, 90 days, or 360 days, fees may vary accordingly
International Certificate of Vaccination is required

on-arrival.name: Mauritius
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 60 days
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee

on-arrival.name: Mozambique
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 30 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 90 days for a fee

on-arrival.name: Nepal
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 90 days within 180 days
Obtainable at Tribhuvan International Airport and certain land borders
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee

on-arrival.name: Oman
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 1 month
Obtainable at any port of entry in Oman
Obtainable Online. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 2 months for a fee
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 21 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Emirate of Dubai or Qatar if arriving directly from the Emirate of Dubai or Qatar respectively
Iris scan taken upon entry

on-arrival.name: Palau
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 30 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 90 days for a fee

on-arrival.name: Samoa
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 60 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 1 month for a fee
Departure tax applies

on-arrival.name: Seychelles
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 3 months within 6 months
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 3 months within 6 months for a fee

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
Visa can be issued on arrival for 30 days if an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival

on-arrival.name: Sri Lanka
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 30 days
Electronic Travel Authorization is obtainable online, at Sri Lanka diplomatic missions overseas, or on arrival at any port of entry in Sri Lanka

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 45 days within 90 days
Obtainable at Dushanbe International Airport
Obtainable online. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 60 days for a fee
Tajikistan plans to completely abolish visa requirements soon

on-arrival.name: East Timor
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 30 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 90 days for a fee

on-arrival.name: Togo
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 7 days
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 90 days for a fee

on-arrival.name: Tuvalu
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 1 month
Extensions of stay is possible up to a maximum of 3 months within 6 months for a fee

on-arrival.name: Uganda
on-arrival.note:
Valid for 3 or 6 months, fees may vary accordingly
Obtainable at Entebbe Airport in Kampala
Obtainable online. Printed visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel
Extensions of stay is possible for a fee
International Certificate of Vaccination is required
